name: 5 Verify the Order Delete API, whether able to delete order
scenarioId: EcommerceAPI/EndtoEnd_E_commerce:5 Verify the Order Delete API, whether able to delete order
methodName: 5 Verify the Order Delete API, whether able to delete order

testSteps.description:
Given add headers to the API with below details:
| Authorization | Content-Type |
| token# | application/json |

And add path parameters to the API with below details:
| OrderId |
| orders[0]# |
When user calls "DeleteOrder" API with "DELETE" request

Then validate the status "200" with below details:
| message |
| Orders Deleted Successfully |

userStory.storyName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.displayName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.narrative: Verify the user can able to create a product and order as well as able to delete order and product.

title: 5 Verify the Order Delete API, whether able to delete order
